title: Mangetsu no Yoru ni Akuma no Kiss
original_name: 満月の夜に悪魔の KISS
sinopse:
Miyama Mei meets a Vampire called Aruto(Alto) and from that day onward an hillarious, romantic and deep relationship will start! In this manga there's smut and it's narration is really hillarious!

(Source: Shoujo Manga Maniac)
